Game.Name: Star Trek - Deep Space Nine - Crossroads of Time (Europe)
Game.plot: Overview:Title Screen Star Trek Deep Space Nine: Crossroads of Time is a secretly great game. It's an action platformer from a time when most games were platformers. You take command of various characters from the TV show who must battle it out with Cardassians, Borg, and other recognizable faces from the Star Trek universe. Shuttle Craft Level Gameplay:The gameplay is simple and mostly consists of platforming and some simple combat. To spice things up there are also boss battles spread throughout the game, as well as an interesting section in which you take control of a shuttle and must navigate through the wormhole and even an asteroid field to catch up to a fugitive. A few other challenges are added and a memorable a level where you take control of the shapeshifting Odo in a stealth mission aboard a Cardassian ship. The point of the game is achieved, it feels like an episode of Star Trek: Deep Space Nine. Crossroads of Time serves as an excellent example of what a good game was at the time as well as how to do a Tv or Film tie in correctly.Cheat: Enable Level SelectAt Password Entry Screen, enter the following password:DAVIDLLevel Select will now be an option on the Options menu.Cheat: Enable Level SelectEnter these passwords on the password screen.
Game.Notes: "Star Trek: Deep Space Nine - Crossroads of Time" is a 2D action game based on the famous TV series. You play Benjamin Sisko, commander of Federation space station Deep Space Nine. When the station is attacked by Bajoran terrorists, your mission to uncover their plot leads you from DS9 to Bajor, beyond the wormhole and even through time itself.
